original_title:
🚨 BREAKING: DHS is considering buying their OWN fleet of airplanes to rapidly increase the rate of deportation flights, per NBC
  — The Donald
article_summary: DHS is considering purchasing its own fleet of airplanes to increase deportation flights, sparking debate on alternative sources and cost-effectiveness. Suggestions include borrowing from the military, reusing decommissioned planes, or even repurposing commercial aircraft.</s>
